content.description: The bark method below is intended to print the string "woof" a total of num times.
content.question: public static void bark(int num){if (num > 0){System.out.println("woof");/* missing code */}}Which of the following can be used to replace /* missing code */ so that the call bark(5) will cause "woof" to be printed five times?

skill.text: 2.C: Write program code involving procedural abstractions.
